articles.title: AI boom makes Nvidia third US stock to close above $2tn valuation - Financial Times
articles.description: Chipmaker joins Apple and Microsoft in reaching milestone after blistering share price ride
articles.content: Nvidias market value closed on Friday above $2tn for the first time, with enthusiasm about the prospects of artificial intelligence fuelling an eighth straight week of gains for the chipmakers shares… [+3348 chars]

articles.title: HPE storage results vanish in financial reporting revamp – Blocks and Files - Blocks and Files
